## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
I'm curious about the Verus ID and NFT Marketplace. Is it possible to execute transactions on the marketplace through a centralized intermediary?

**AI Assistant:**
No, that's not possible. The marketplace allows for completely decentralized transactions, where buyers and sellers can interact directly, peer-to-peer, without the need for any intermediary. This ensures that transactions are secure, transparent, and under the control of the parties involved.

**User:**
That makes sense. I also have a question about Verus Vault. Can I spend funds from a VerusID that is locked with Verus Vault?

**AI Assistant:**
No, you cannot spend funds from a VerusID that is locked with Verus Vault. When a VerusID is locked with Vault, you cannot spend funds from that identity at all until it is again unlocked. However, you can still receive funds and stake those same funds on the Verus network to earn rewards. This adds an extra layer of security to your assets while still allowing you to participate in the network.

**User:**
Okay, got it. And one more question about Verus Vault. Do I need to have multiple identities configured to use Verus Vault and its capabilities?

**AI Assistant:**
Yes, you do need to have at least two identities configured to use Verus Vault and its capabilities. Specifically, you need to have one primary identity and at least one revocation/recovery ID configured to enable revocation, recovery, and all Verus Vault capabilities. This setup allows for additional security and flexibility in managing your assets and identities.
Is it possible to execute transactions on the Verus ID and NFT Marketplace through a centralized intermediary?

No, it is not possible to execute transactions on the Verus ID and NFT Marketplace through a centralized intermediary. The marketplace allows for completely decentralized transactions, where buyers and sellers can interact directly, peer-to-peer, without the need for any intermediary.

### Verus ID and NFT Marketplace
Buy and sell VerusIDs on-chain, advertising your offer directly to the owner of an ID or NFT, or posting the sale of your NFT on the worldwide blockchain for all the world to see. Execute transactions in a completely decentralized way. Pay or offer to pay from a transparent or zero-knowledge private address, still auditable by you. Accept payment to either as well, and best of all, execute your transactions directly, peer-to-peer without any intermediary necessary. Don’t worry the on-chain model still makes room for owners to select and share proceeds with value added agents, marketing organizations, or other participants in a new economy of provable digital ownership. It’s the next step in the evolution of VerusID, the most powerful self-sovereign identity and secure storage model for funds in the digital world.### Verus Vault
With Verus Vault you can now protect funds on a VerusID, even from theft of a private key! If you lock your VerusID with Vault you cannot spend funds from that identity at all until it is again unlocked. While locked, you can still stake those same funds on the Verus network and earn by doing so. Of course, you can also still receive funds.IT IS IMPORTANT TO NOTE THAT ENABLING REVOCATION, RECOVERY, AND ALL VERUS VAULT CAPABILITIES REQUIRE YOU TO HAVE ONE PRIMARY IDENTITY, AND AT LEAST ONE REVOCATION/RECOVERY ID CONFIGURED.
